participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Emily loves to engage in conversations and share experiences. She has a passion for music and enjoys the thrill of live performances.
participant_1.background: I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time. I work out to look good. I barely show up to work. I love cooking and my favorite food is what I prepare in my home. I've had the same job for 8 years.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Jordan has a deep appreciation for music and literature. He is determined to pursue his dreams and enjoys collaborating with others.
participant_2.background: I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well. I like to play volleyball. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I want to become an author. I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.

content.text: Not much, just trying to figure out how to get into the music industry.
Oh, that sounds cool. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is The 1975. What's yours?
I don't really have a favorite band, I just like a lot of different music.
That's cool. Do you like to go to concerts?
Yeah, I love going to concerts. I just went to see The Killers a few weeks ago and it was amazing.
I've always wanted to see The Killers live. They're one of my favorite bands.
You should definitely go see them if you get the chance. They put on a great show.
I'll try to catch them next time they're in town.
Cool. Do you play any instruments?
I used to play the drums, but I haven't played in a while.
That's cool. I used to play the piano, but I don't really play anymore either.
It's too bad we don't live closer, we could start a band together.
That would be fun. Maybe we can start one online.
That would be cool. I'll have to think of some songs to write.
Cool. I'll start working on some drums parts.
